properties.description: IMS_Entity Curted Layer for PBI Reports

content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                 FROM    sys.schemas
                 WHERE   name = 'miPINS' )
     EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [miPINS]');
 GO

 --CREATE VIEW FOR IMS Entity PBI Report

 CREATE OR ALTER VIEW miPINS.vw_mipins_IMS_Entity
 AS

SELECT

	[bdce_id] as [entity_id],
	[bdc_entity_name] as [entity_name],
	isnull(load.get_ims_display_name([business_area_c]), [business_area_c]) as [business_area],
	[information_owner_c] as [entity_information_owner],
	[information_expert_c] as [entity_information_expert],
	[type],
	[status],
	[priority],
	[resolution],
	[work_log],
	isnull(load.get_ims_display_name([business_criticality]), [business_criticality]) as business_criticality,
	[date_modified]

FROM
	

GO
